title: He Has The Mama And The Daughter Hooked
itunes:title: He Has The Mama And The Daughter Hooked
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m writing for my friend because she has lost her mind and I need her to realize what she’s doing is wrong. My 28 year old friend has 2 children by her mother’s 56 year old boyfriend who I’ll call “Larry.” Her mother thinks that she has been dating a guy that she met in college and she’s never even asked to meet this guy. I honestly can’t stand “Larry” and whenever I’m around him, he seems like a pervert..................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m writing for my friend because she has lost her mind and I need her to realize what she’s doing is wrong. My 28 year old friend has 2 children by her mother’s 56 year old boyfriend who I’ll call “Larry.” Her mother thinks that she has been dating a guy that she met in college and she’s never even asked to meet this guy. I honestly can’t stand “Larry” and whenever I’m around him, he seems like a pervert..................
